title: Inventure pip Greenwoood
text:
Inventure pip Greenwoood Inventure pip Greenwoood October 11, 2015, Bengaluru, DHNS 
Inventure Academy beat Greenwood High School 1-0 in the finals to emerge champion in the under-12 category of the inaugural BFC Inter-School Soccer Shield at the Bangalore Football Stadium on Saturday. Arnav Rakkhit scored in the only goal of the match in the 3rd minute for the winners.In the under-10 category finals, Head Start recorded 1-1 (10-9 via penalties) win over Greenwood to claim the title.Results: Final: U-12: Inventure Academy: 1 (Arnav Rakkhit 3rd) bt Greenwood High: 0.U-10: Head Start: 1 (Riki Kamat 27th) bt Greenwood: 1 (Abhinav Shanbaug 11th) 10-9 via penaties. 
Idian boxer Vijender Singh celebrates after winning the match against England's Sonny Whiting...
